treatment-md.title: Gubernatoriana thackerayi Pati, Thackeray & Khaire, 2016, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: Five new species of freshwater crabs of the genera Ghatiana Pati & Sharma, 2014, and Gubernatoriana Bott, 1970 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura: Gecarcinucidae Rathbun, 1904) from the Western Ghats, India
